text: Eduardo Raúl Flores (23 April 1944 – 20 January 2022) was an Argentine football striker. He played for Estudiantes de La Plata in Argentina and Nancy in France. Flores died on 20 January 2022 in Buenos Aires from cancer, aged 77.Murió el "Bocha" Flores, gloria de Estudiantes ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina Category:Argentine footballers Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Eduardo Flores
